translation.value: two cups of coffee at 8 kronor (each)

idiom.value: har man sagt a får man också säga b ("har man börjat får man fortsätta")

translation.value: in for a penny, in for a pound ("what you start you must finish off")
the first letter of the alphabet
the sixth tone in the scale of C major

idiom.value: hålla sig (el. vara) à jour (med något) ("hålla sig informerad")

translation.value: keep up to date (with sth.), keep abreast (of sth.) ("keep oneself informed")
in the style or manner of
with a separate price for each dish on the menu
The Swedish Motor Vehicle Inspection Co.
the Swedish Motor Vehicle Inspection Co.

explanation.value: Man utför dessutom frivilliga trafiksäkerhetskontroller, konditionstest av bilar, registreringsbesiktningar m m. Staten är största delägare.

translation.value: "Also carries out voluntary road safety tests, general motor-vehicle performance tests, registration tests, etc. The State is the majority owner."

definition.value: ett bolag som på sina stationer runt om i Sverige utför årliga obligatoriska kontrollbesiktningar av bilar

translation.value: a company which carries out compulsory annual motor vehicle inspection (MOT) tests at testing stations in various parts of Sweden

definition.value: titel för katolska präster som inte tillhör någon orden

translation.value: the mother who is the superior of a convent of nuns

definition.value: de första grunderna till ngt; alfabet

translation.value: an elementary book for teaching children to read

definition.value: kärnvapen samt biologiska och kemiska vapen

translation.value: relinquish a throne, power, etc.; resign

explanation.value: Studieförbund som anordnar studiecirklar i den kommun där det finns representerat.

translation.value: "An adult educational association which arranges study circles in the municipalities in which it is represented."

definition.value: beställning i förväg el. för längre tid (av tidning, teaterplats etc.)

translation.value: an advance or standing order (for a newspaper, theatre seat, etc.)

definition.value: person som abonnerar på något; fast kund

translation.value: a person who subscribes to sth.; a regular customer

explanation.value: Kostnadsfri rådgivning i frågor som rör abort. Man kan vända sig t ex till mödravårdscentral, distriktsläkare eller kvinnoklinik på sjukhus.

translation.value: "Free advice and counselling on abortion and related matters. Help is available from maternity centres, district medical officers, women's clinics, etc."

definition.value: person som inte dricker någon alkohol; helnykterist

translation.value: a person who refrains from consuming alcoholic drinks
the job absorbed him completely, he was engrossed in his work
abstinence from drinking, using drugs, etc.

definition.value: skapa en abstrakt bild (av); tänka abstrakt

translation.value: create an abstract image (of); think in abstract terms

idiom.value: abstrakt konst ("konst som inte avbildar yttre ting")

definition.value: som bara kan upplevas genom tanken; inte verklig; svårfattlig

translation.value: which can only be experienced through thought; unreal; abstruse
a product of thought; a general idea or term
the stress is on the first syllable

definition.value: betoning (av ett ord el. en del av ett ord), tonvikt

translation.value: international discord has become more pronounced
also mark or pronounce with an accent or stress

definition.value: säga ja till (något som erbjuds); gå med på, godkänna
skatt på tillverkning eller försäljning av en vara t ex omsättningsskatt, sprit- och tobaksskatt, energiskatt m fl

translation.value: a duty levied on the manufacture or sale of an item of goods, such as Value Added Tax, liquor and tobacco duty, energy tax, etc.

example.value: hon acklimatiserade sig långsamt i Sverige

translation.value: she acclimatized herself to life in Sweden only very slowly
become accustomed to a new environment, get to feel at home

translation.comment: in a general sense, "heard at the same time as"

definition.value: spela t ex piano till (en solostämma etc); följas av

translation.value: play the piano or other instrument as an accompaniment (to a solo part, etc.); go along or in company with
hundred per cent incentive, straight piecework system
be on piece rate, do piecework

definition.value: lön som bygger på att man utför en viss mängd arbete för en viss betalning; betinglön, stycklön

translation.value: wage paid for an agreed amount of work; contract wage
strike a chord on the piano
a combination of musical tones sounded simultaneously

explanation.value: När ett bolag kommit på obestånd och inte kan betala sina skulder träffas en uppgörelse mellan en gäldenär (bolaget) och hans borgenärer (fordringsägarna) om nedsättning av skulderna så att konkurs undviks.

translation.value: "If a company becomes insolvent and is unable to pay its debts, the company (the debtor) and those to whom payment is due (the creditors) may attempt to reach an agreement under which the size of the debt is reduced in an effort to avoid forcing the company into bankruptcy."

definition.value: överenskommelse mellan skuldsatt person och hans fordringsägare om nedsättning eller senareläggning av betalningsskyldigheten

translation.value: agreement between a debtor and his creditor(s) discharging the debt in exchange for part payment of the amount due or deferring payment until some later date
provide or send with credentials (as diplomats, journalists)

definition.value: hudsjukdom (hos ungdomar) med utslag ("finnar") i ansiktet och på halsen

translation.value: disease of the skin (in young people) characterized by pimples on the face and neck

idiom.value: ta något ad notam ("lägga något på minnet")

translation.value: take sth. to heart ("make a mental note of")

definition.value: knölen på halsens framsida hos vuxen man

translation.value: the lump at the front of the neck mostly seen in adult men
"one of the four rules of arithmetic"

explanation.value: Adeln var ett av de fyra s k stånd (adel, präster, borgare och bönder) som den svenska riksdagen bestod av fram till 1866.

translation.value: "One of the "four estates" (nobility, clergy, burgers, peasantry) of which the Swedish Riksdag (Parliament) was comprised until 1866."

definition.value: samhällsklass som tidigare hade ärvda sociala förmåner

translation.value: a class of society that once enjoyed inherited social privileges
The Eighteen ("members of the Swedish Academy")

definition.value: en ordklass som anger egenskap (t ex "liten, röd, glad")

translation.value: a class of words functioning as modifiers of nouns and indicating a property (e.g. "small, red, happy")

definition.value: tillkalla som tillfällig medlem (t ex i en styrelse)

translation.value: co-opt, as of a temporary member of a board of directors

explanation.value: Används om ämneslärare, dvs från och med grundskolans högstadium.

translation.value: "Title used for subject teachers, i.e. as of upper level of nine-year compulsory school."

translation.comment: literally, "give a higher value to, ennoble"

definition.value: leda planering och skötsel av (t ex ett företag); förvalta

translation.comment: also figuratively, "to choose or make one's own"

definition.value: ta hand om annans barn som sitt eget för vård och uppfostran

translation.value: to take the child of other parents and bring it up as if it were one's own

explanation.value: Barnet ("adoptivbarnet") får samma rättsliga ställning som om det skulle ha fötts av sina nya föräldrar ("adoptivföräldrarna").

translation.value: "The child ("adopted child") enjoys the same legal rights as if it had been born of its new parents ("adoptive parents")."

definition.value: upptagande av annans barn som sitt eget för vård och uppfostran

translation.value: the taking of the child of other parents to bring it up as if it were one's own

definition.value: ett hormon (som kroppen producerar vid t ex rädsla)

translation.value: a hormone (produced by the body in reaction to fear, etc.)

definition.value: uppgift om var någon bor, bostad

translation.value: information where a person lives; home address

definition.value: mottagare, den som man sänder något till

translation.value: recipient, person to whom mail is addressed
the letter is addressed to you
"Advent calendar", a calendar for Advent having one small picture for each of the days leading up to Christmas

explanation.value: Det nya kyrkoåret börjar första söndagen i advent.

translation.value: "The ecclesiastical year begins on the first Sunday in Advent."
a part of speech, such as "often, not, there"

definition.value: satsdel som anger t ex tid, plats, sätt

translation.value: a clause element functioning as an adverb indicative of time, place, manner, etc.
defence counsel, counsel for the defence

definition.value: juridiskt utbildad person som kan hjälpa folk i rättsliga frågor

translation.value: a person trained in the law whose profession is to advise clients in legal matters and represent them in court

explanation.value: Det finns både allmänna och privata advokatbyråer.

translation.value: "There are both public and private law offices."

definition.value: byrå där man får hjälp i rättsliga frågor

translation.value: an office to which members of the public may turn for advice in legal matters
a combining form meaning "air", used to form compound words such as "aero- drome"

definition.value: hjärnskada som medför svårigheter att tala och förstå

translation.value: difficulty in speaking or understanding spoken or written language due to injury of the brain

definition.value: som uppträder onaturligt el. överdrivet, tillgjord
värde (hos ett föremål) som grundas på personliga minnen snarare än på pengar el. konstnärlig kvalitet

translation.value: value associated with an object for personal reasons rather than for its intrinsic monetary or artistic worth
do business (have dealings) with other countries, run an international business
deal worth millions, transaction involving millions (of pounds, kronor, etc.)
business, the world of business (commerce), business (commercial) life
go to the shop, go shopping
